segments.text: Did your eye doctor prescribe you contact lenses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I ’ d like to know something about contact lenses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . We have both hard and soft contact lenses . They are very popular , but a little more expensive than ordinary glasses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have found I ’ m short-sighted recently . I need to wear glasses . As a student , it ’ s better for me to wear ordinary glasses instead of contact lenses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have many kinds of glasses here . Which frames do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the square-shaped ones will be the best for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about this pair ? They are the ' in ' things now in optical wear . Try them on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They fit me very well . I like them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please go to receive optometry first over there .
segments.speaker: S1
